p:
The MS peak list was subjected to MetaboAnalyst 3.0 for statistical analysis. PCA and pathway analysis were performed with the web-based software MetaboAnalyst 3.0
3 . Briefly, missing values were replaced by 1/5 of min positive values of their corresponding variables. Sample normalization by sum and data scaling by auto scaling were applied (mean centered and divided by the standard deviation of each variation) ( Supplementary Figures 2A,D). Fold change analysis was used to compare the absolute value of change between two groups (Fold change threshold: two). Nonparametric tests were employed according to the normalized data (Adjusted P-value (FDR) cutoff <0.05). The different metabolites were subjected to enrichment analysis and pathway analysis in MetaboAnalyst 3.0 by KEGG.
